publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8083 Stewart Maxwell: The Jewish Way of Life—That the Parliament welcomes the launch ofthe Jewish Way of Life educational resource about Judaism; considers this an excellent resource and congratulates the PearsFoundation for funding it; further congratulates Learning and Teaching Scotland for working with the Scottish Council of Jewish Communitiestomake this resource available inScotland, and urges all schools to investigate this new teaching aidin the recognitionthat education is key to fostering goodcommunity relations. Supported by: Ken Macintosh*, Bill Wilson*, Mike Pringle*, Bill Kidd*, Jackson Carlaw*
S3M-8083 The Jewish Way of Life (lodged on 7 March 2011) Rob Gibson*, Jamie Hepburn*, Linda Fabiani*
S3M-8083 The Jewish Way of Life (lodged on 7 March 2011) Annabel Goldie*, Anne McLaughlin*
S3M-8083 The Jewish Way of Life (lodged on 7 March 2011) Stuart McMillan*, Dave Thompson*, Joe FitzPatrick*

S3M-8083 Stewart Maxwell: The Jewish Way of Life—That the Parliament welcomes the launch ofthe Jewish Way of Life educational resource about Judaism; considers this an excellent resource and congratulates the PearsFoundation for funding it; further congratulates Learning and Teaching Scotland for working with the Scottish Council of Jewish Communitiestomake this resource available inScotland, and urges all schools to investigate this new teaching aidin the recognitionthat education is key to fostering goodcommunity relations. Supported by: Ken Macintosh, Bill Wilson, Mike Pringle, Bill Kidd, Jackson Carlaw, Rob Gibson, Jamie Hepburn, Linda Fabiani, Annabel Goldie, Anne McLaughlin, Stuart McMillan, Dave Thompson, Joe FitzPatrick
S3M-8083 The Jewish Way of Life (lodged on 7 March 2011) Tom McCabe*
S3M-8083 The Jewish Way of Life (lodged on 7 March 2011) Gil Paterson*
